description.value:
Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mercy], you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lay on Hands] on a creature that died since your last turn to return it to life. The target returns to life with 1 hit point and becomes wounded 1. You can't use Ultimate Mercy if the triggering effect was disintegrate or a death effect.
